sessions.description: Honor and celebrate legislative staff contributions. Muffy Davis, a seven-time Paralympic medalist, will share insights on perseverance and strength.

sessions.title: The Supreme Court: Unpacking the Impact
sessions.description: Explore U.S. Supreme Court decisions' implications for states, covering topics like gun regulation, gender-affirming care, disability rights, and free speech.

sessions.title: Self-Care: Mission Critical
speakers: Mark Quiner, Director, National Conference of State Legislatures
sessions.description: The work of legislators and staff can be so demanding that they neglect themselves. And if you don't care for yourself, you have nothing left to give to others.
